biography: Vin Scully was born on November 29, 1927 in Bronx, New York, USA as Vincent Edward Scully. He is an actor, known for For Love of the Game (1999), 1983 MLB All-Star Game (1983) and 1985 MLB All-Star Game  (1985). He has been married to Sandra Hunt since November 10, 1973.  They have one child. He was previously married to Joan Crawford.
name: Vin Scully
